description: 乱码检测训练数据集 - 请添加更多样本以提高准确率

samples.text: 这是一段正常的中文文本，用于测试乱码检测功能。
今天天气很好，适合出门散步。
Python是一种广泛使用的高级编程语言。
The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.
Hello world! This is a normal English sentence.
Machine learning is a subset of artificial intelligence.
中英文混合文本 Mixed Chinese and English text 也是正常的。
邮箱地址：test@example.com，电话：13800138000

The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog. This is a normal English sentence with proper grammar and spelling.
随着人工智能技术的快速发展，机器学习在各个领域都取得了显著的成果。自然语言处理是其中重要的研究方向之一。
Today's weather forecast shows sunny skies with a high of 25°C. It's a perfect day for outdoor activities and enjoying nature.
在数字化转型的浪潮中，企业需要不断适应新技术，提升竞争力。云计算和大数据分析成为关键的技术支撑。
Research indicates that regular exercise can improve both physical and mental health. Doctors recommend at least 30 minutes daily.
中国传统文化源远流长，博大精深。从诗词歌赋到哲学思想，都体现了中华民族的智慧和创造力。
Global warming is one of the most pressing issues facing humanity today. Reducing carbon emissions requires international cooperation.
随着5G技术的普及，物联网应用将更加广泛。智能家居、智慧城市等领域都将迎来新的发展机遇。
Education plays a vital role in personal development and social progress. Quality education should be accessible to all children worldwide.
在市场经济条件下，企业需要不断创新才能保持竞争优势。产品研发和市场营销都是重要的环节。
